insert.foreach: insert into t_order (order_id, c_id, num, shop_id, user_id, order_state, affirm_time, version) values (#{item.orderId}, #{item.cId}, #{item.goodsCount}, #{shopId}, #{userId}, 0, now(), 0)

mapper.select: SELECT c_name, image_path, introduce, sell, a.num goodsCount, a.c_id cId FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b on a.c_id = b.c_id where order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT d.shop_name, address, order_id, sum(price * a.num) orderAllCost, sum(a.num) orderAllGoodsCount, order_id FROM ( t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.c_id = b.c_id ) LEFT JOIN t_shop d ON a.shop_id = d.shop_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY a.order_id, a.shop_id, d.shop_name, address
SELECT a.c_id cId, b.image_path imagePath FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.c_id = b.c_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}

insert.foreach: insert into t_comment (c_id, info, grade, user_id, gmt_create, order_id) values (#{item.cId}, #{item.info}, #{item.grade}, #{userId}, now(), #{orderId})

mapper.update: UPDATE t_commodity a SET grade = ( SELECT AVG(grade) FROM t_comment b WHERE a.c_id = b.c_id )
